title: IS IT FAIR TO COMPARE A TRACTOR VS A SKID STEER?

tasks.task: Evaluate the pros and cons of using a tractor versus a skid steer.
subtasks: Compare pricing between the two machines, noting the cost difference in the base machines and attachments.
Analyze maintenance considerations, including service intervals and typical costs.
Assess operator visibility and safety in both machines, considering front-end loader vs three-point hitch attachments.
Compare weight and towing/hauling requirements between tractors and skid steers.
Discuss the maneuverability and impact on different surfaces (e.g., lawn, paved roads).
Evaluate the hydraulic systems and available attachments for each machine.
Conclude by weighing user preferences and specific use cases for each type of equipment.
